title: Watch: Neeraj Chopra interacts with Shafali Verma and Co ahead of U19 Women’s T20 World Cup final
content:
𝐖𝐨𝐫𝐝𝐬 𝐨𝐟 𝐖𝐢𝐬𝐝𝐨𝐦! 👏🏻👏🏻Just the motivation #TeamIndia needed ahead of the inaugural #U19T20WorldCup Final! 🗣️🗣️ Hear what Javelin thrower & Olympic Gold medallist @Neeraj_chopra1 had to say to the #WomenInBlue before the summit clash 👇🏻 pic.twitter.com/vyDDedAj0v— BCCI Women (@BCCIWomen) January 29, 2023

Motivation boost 👊Olympic Gold medalist @Neeraj_chopra1 shares words of wisdom with young India stars ahead of their #U19T20WorldCup final against England 📽️ pic.twitter.com/xoOl2uWBk1— ICC (@ICC) January 29, 2023
author: Scroll Staff
tags: ICC U19 Women’s T20 World Cup
